body: There's more story after the marriage? More than 10 years later, Makoto cleans up her library of grimoire, entrusting them to Sheera (the demon princess). Things has settled down, and the Destroyer released back then has been killed. Makoto finally decide it's time to stop fooling around and be a good mother. To her, their daughter Elise is like her, introverted and having problem to get along with people. Although in reality, that daughter awakened the succubus power and has been conquering girls, and she's enjoying it.
